emails.subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix
emails.body_text:
Okay, thank you Saber for your help!

 

As they had the same name, I renamed them to reflect their frequency (monthly)/(weekly)

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 4:25 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello ,

 

The dataset you put a screenshot of is not the same as the one used in the TradeMatrix 

this is the one used :
https://dnexr.dnext.io/datasets/dnexr-structured-eucomm-gno-eur-tf_customs_aggregation-weekly 

and it contains only data until Dec 2024 

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 15:04
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello Saber,

 

I see that the years after 2025 now show properly and I can edit forecasts, thank you.

 

However, it seems that the latest data is still not visible. For example, for Europe, the DS is updated with data until May 2025 but it only shows until December 2024.

 



 



 

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 3:45 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello , 

 

Should be good now,

 

The forecast that was not updated since Mai and did not have the unit column like the others was causing the refresh to not work, its good now

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 13:30
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello Enea,

 

Checking it right now,

 

thanks

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 12:32
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello,

 

Also seems the data does not update properly. Looking at TF used in priority rules, there should be data for first months of 2025, but the update seems not to work.

 



 

From: Enea Albertoli 
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 1:24 PM
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Subject: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello,

 

I cannot view or edit data after September 2025.

 

https://dnexr.dnext.io/fundamentals/tradematrix/dnexr-rapeseedmeal

 

Both “Settings” and “Configuration” should allow for data to be visualized or edited up until 2026.
emails.body_html:
Okay, thank you Saber for your help!

 

As they had the same name, I renamed them to reflect their frequency (monthly)/(weekly)

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 4:25 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello ,

 

The dataset you put a screenshot of is not the same as the one used in the TradeMatrix

this is the one used :
https://dnexr.dnext.io/datasets/dnexr-structured-eucomm-gno-eur-tf_customs_aggregation-weekly

and it contains only data until Dec 2024

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 15:04
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello Saber,

 

I see that the years after 2025 now show properly and I can edit forecasts, thank you.

 

However, it seems that the latest data is still not visible. For example, for Europe, the DS is updated with data until May 2025 but it only shows until December 2024.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 3:45 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello ,

 

Should be good now,

 

The forecast that was not updated since Mai and did not have the unit column like the others was causing the refresh to not work, its good now

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 13:30
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello Enea,

 

Checking it right now,

 

thanks

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 12:32
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello,

 

Also seems the data does not update properly. Looking at TF used in priority rules, there should be data for first months of 2025, but the update seems not to work.

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli
Sent: Thursday, July 31, 2025 1:24 PM
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io>
Subject: RSM Trade Matrix

 

Hello,

 

I cannot view or edit data after September 2025.

 

https://dnexr.dnext.io/fundamentals/tradematrix/dnexr-rapeseedmeal

 

Both “Settings” and “Configuration” should allow for data to be visualized or edited up until 2026.

https://dnexr.dnext.io/fundamentals/tradematrix/dnexr-rapeseedmeal

 

Both “Settings” and “Configuration” should allow for data to be visualized or edited up until 2026.
emails.body_html:
Hello ,

 

Should be good now,

 

The forecast that was not updated since Mai and did not have the unit column like the others was causing the refresh to not work, its good now

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah
